summary.text:
<analysis>
[Chronological Review: Walk through conversation phases: initial request → exploration → implementation → debugging → current state]
- Initial request: “Australian Financial Services Licence, find legislation, no caselaw.”
- Exploration: Identified AFSL framework within Commonwealth legislation: Corporations Act 2001 (Cth) Part 7.6 (licensing), Part 7.1 (definitions), supported by Corporations Regulations 2001 (Cth); related consumer/conduct provisions in the ASIC Act 2001 and ASIC Regulations.
- Implementation: Collected authoritative sources (AustLII Commonwealth Consolidated Acts/Regulations). Attempted scoped search links, then pivoted to direct deep-linking each relevant section page due to unstable search endpoints.
- Debugging/adjustment: A search endpoint returned “Gone” (deprecated). Strategy changed to verifying each target section with direct URLs and confirming headings/subsections match expectations.
- Current state: A growing, verified pack of direct legislation links for AFSL core provisions has been assembled. Early verified Corporations Act sections: s 911A, s 912A, s 913A, s 913B, s 914A, s 915B; and s 763A, s 766A. Most recent wave verified additional Part 7.6 and Part 7.1 provisions (s 915A, s 916A, s 916B, s 917B, s 920A, s 922A, s 926A, s 766B, s 766C). Preparing the final curated legislation-only link pack.

[Intent Mapping: List each explicit user request with message context]
- “Australian Financial Services Licence, find legislation, no caselaw.”
  - Provide legislation-only sources that govern AFSL.
  - Exclude case law and commentary.
  - Deliver working direct links to relevant Act sections and Regulations.

[Technical Inventory: Catalog all technologies, patterns, and decisions mentioned]
- Sources/databases: AustLII Commonwealth Consolidated Acts and Regulations:
  - Corporations Act 2001 (Cth), Corporations Regulations 2001 (Cth).
  - ASIC Act 2001 (Cth), ASIC Regulations 2001 (Cth).
- Approach:
  - Replace fragile search endpoints with verified direct section URLs.
  - Prioritize Corporations Act Part 7.6 + Part 7.1 definitions; then Corporations Regulations; then ASIC Act provisions.
  - Verify each page loads and heading/subsections match intended content.
- Constraints: Legislation-only; no case law.

[Code Archaeology: Document every file, function, and code change discussed]
- No codebase/files; this is a legal research and link-verification task.

[Progress Assessment: What's done vs. pending with specific status]
- Done:
  - Identified core Acts/Regs for AFSL.
  - Verified direct, working links to key Corporations Act sections:
    - Part 7.6 (licensing/admin): s 911A, s 912A, s 913A, s 913B, s 914A, s 915A, s 915B, s 916A, s 916B, s 917B, s 920A, s 922A, s 926A.
    - Part 7.1 (definitions): s 763A (financial product), s 766A (financial service), s 766B (financial product advice/personal/general), s 766C (dealing).
  - Located entry points for Corporations Regulations and ASIC Act/Regulations.
- Pending:
  - Complete enumeration of Part 7.6 and adjacent relevant provisions (e.g., s 911B; any 912B–F; s 914B; s 915C; s 916C–F; Div 8 full set including s 920B ff.; full Subdiv registers obligations s 922B+).
  - Identify and link the specific implementing Corporations Regulations (e.g., regs 7.1.x and 7.6.x such as 7.6.01, 7.6.02, 7.6.02AA, 7.6.04 etc.).
  - Add relevant ASIC Act consumer/conduct provisions with direct links (e.g., s 12BAA, s 12DA, s 12DB, s 12DF).
  - Deliver the curated legislation-only link pack.

[Context Validation: Ensure all critical information for continuation is captured]
- Central requirement: legislation-only, no case law.
- Corpus focus: Corporations Act Part 7.6/Part 7.1, Corporations Regulations, and ASIC Act provisions.
- Rationale for direct-link approach recorded (deprecated search endpoint).
- Most recent verified sections listed with key takeaways to guide completion.

[Recent Commands Analysis: Last agent commands executed, tool results (truncated if long), immediate pre-summarization state]
- Recent agent commands: Multiple fetch_webpage calls to AustLII direct section URLs to verify headings and core content:
  - s915A (Varying licences): Confirms ASIC may vary an AFSL to reflect name changes; must notify licensee; notes on fees and that licence conditions can be varied under s 914A.
  - s915B (Immediate suspension or cancellation): Grounds and procedures for individuals, partnerships, bodies corporate, and trustees; includes levy and CSLR non-payment triggers; AFCA/CSLR links; mandatory cancellations in certain circumstances.
  - s916A (How representatives are authorised): Licensee may authorise representatives by written notice; void if outside licence scope or contrary to banning/disqualification orders or s 921C(2); revocation mechanics.
  - s916B (Sub-authorisations): When and how an authorised representative can sub-authorise individuals with licensee consent; record-keeping; limits; offences for improper authorisation.
  - s917B (Responsibility if representative of only one licensee): Licensee responsibility to clients for representative’s conduct where rep acts for only one licensee.
  - s920A (ASIC’s power to make a banning order): Extensive grounds including 912A non-compliance, not fit and proper, training/competency deficiencies, involvement/likely involvement in contraventions, AFCA/CSLR links; hearing rights and special procedures.
  - s922A (Registers relating to financial services): ASIC must maintain registers (licensees, authorised reps, banning/disqualification orders, etc.); regulations may prescribe details.
  - s926A (Exemptions and modifications by ASIC): ASIC may exempt/declare/modifiy provisions of Part 7.6 (excluding Div 4 & 8) for persons/products; conditions; legislative instrument status; Gazette/internet publication; prosecution burden of proof clause.
  - s763A (Meaning of financial product): Defines through investment, risk management, or non-cash payments; subject to s 763E; includes common-kind clause; does not cease if transferred.
  - s766A (Meaning of financial service): Lists services (advice, dealing, market making, operating schemes/CCIV, custodial/depository, crowd-funding, claims handling, super trustee services, prescribed conduct); reg-making power; clerk/cashier exception; overlap note.
  - s766B (Meaning of financial product advice, personal advice and general advice): Defines advice; distinguishes personal vs general; exceptions (lawyers, tax agents), AML caveat, DDO-related non-advice scenarios, claims handling carveouts.
  - s766C (Meaning of dealing): Activities constituting dealing; arranging; own-behalf exceptions; government/entity carve-outs; sub-underwriting; regulation-making powers.
- Immediate pre-summarization state: Actively verifying definitional sections (s 766B, s 766C) after verifying core licensing/admin sections, consolidating a comprehensive legislation-only link set.
- Triggering context: The cumulative, verbose section content from many fetches expanded context length; summarization triggered to compact while preserving essentials.

</analysis>

[Recent Commands Analysis: Last agent commands executed, tool results (truncated if long), immediate pre-summarization state]
- Recent agent commands: Multiple fetch_webpage calls to AustLII direct section URLs to verify headings and core content:
  - s915A (Varying licences): Confirms ASIC may vary an AFSL to reflect name changes; must notify licensee; notes on fees and that licence conditions can be varied under s 914A.
  - s915B (Immediate suspension or cancellation): Grounds and procedures for individuals, partnerships, bodies corporate, and trustees; includes levy and CSLR non-payment triggers; AFCA/CSLR links; mandatory cancellations in certain circumstances.
  - s916A (How representatives are authorised): Licensee may authorise representatives by written notice; void if outside licence scope or contrary to banning/disqualification orders or s 921C(2); revocation mechanics.
  - s916B (Sub-authorisations): When and how an authorised representative can sub-authorise individuals with licensee consent; record-keeping; limits; offences for improper authorisation.
  - s917B (Responsibility if representative of only one licensee): Licensee responsibility to clients for representative’s conduct where rep acts for only one licensee.
  - s920A (ASIC’s power to make a banning order): Extensive grounds including 912A non-compliance, not fit and proper, training/competency deficiencies, involvement/likely involvement in contraventions, AFCA/CSLR links; hearing rights and special procedures.
  - s922A (Registers relating to financial services): ASIC must maintain registers (licensees, authorised reps, banning/disqualification orders, etc.); regulations may prescribe details.
  - s926A (Exemptions and modifications by ASIC): ASIC may exempt/declare/modifiy provisions of Part 7.6 (excluding Div 4 & 8) for persons/products; conditions; legislative instrument status; Gazette/internet publication; prosecution burden of proof clause.
  - s763A (Meaning of financial product): Defines through investment, risk management, or non-cash payments; subject to s 763E; includes common-kind clause; does not cease if transferred.
  - s766A (Meaning of financial service): Lists services (advice, dealing, market making, operating schemes/CCIV, custodial/depository, crowd-funding, claims handling, super trustee services, prescribed conduct); reg-making power; clerk/cashier exception; overlap note.
  - s766B (Meaning of financial product advice, personal advice and general advice): Defines advice; distinguishes personal vs general; exceptions (lawyers, tax agents), AML caveat, DDO-related non-advice scenarios, claims handling carveouts.
  - s766C (Meaning of dealing): Activities constituting dealing; arranging; own-behalf exceptions; government/entity carve-outs; sub-underwriting; regulation-making powers.
- Immediate pre-summarization state: Actively verifying definitional sections (s 766B, s 766C) after verifying core licensing/admin sections, consolidating a comprehensive legislation-only link set.
- Triggering context: The cumulative, verbose section content from many fetches expanded context length; summarization triggered to compact while preserving essentials.

# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 912A General obligations


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 912A

General obligations

# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A

Meaning of financial product 
  (1)   A [financial product](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_product) is a facility through which, or through the acquisition of which, a [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person) does one or more of the following:

 
  (a)   [makes a financial investment](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#makes_a_financial_investment);
...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A
...
  (b)   [manages financial risk](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#manages_financial_risk);

 
  (c)   [makes non](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#makes_non) - cash [payments](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#payment).

 
This has effect subject to [section](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#section)   763E.
...

...

### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A
...
  (2)   A particular facility that is of a [kind](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#kind) through which people commonly make [financial investments](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_investment), manage [financial risks](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_risk) or make non - cash [payments](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#payment) is a [financial product](...

General obligations

 
  (1)   A [financial services licensee](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_services_licensee) must:

 
  (a)   do all things necessary to ensure that the [financial services](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_service) covered by the licence are [provided](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#provide) efficiently, honestly and fairly; and

# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913A Applying for a licence


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913A

Applying for a licence 
    A [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person) may apply for an [Australian financial services licence](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#australian_financial_services_licence) by lodging an application with [ASIC](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#asic) in a [prescribed form](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#prescribed_form) that:
    ...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913A Applying for a licence


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913A
...
  (a)   includes the [information](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#information) required by regulations [made](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s1371.html#made) for the purposes of this [paragraph](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s913b.html#paragraph); and
...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913A Applying for a licence


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913A
...
  (b)   is accompanied by the documents (if any) required by regulations [made](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s1371.html#made) for the purposes of this [paragraph](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s913b.html#paragraph).

 
Note:   For [fees](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s601raa.html#fees) in respect of lodging applications, see Part   9.10.

# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B When a licence may be granted


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B

When a licence may be granted 
  (1)   [ASIC](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#asic) must grant an applicant an [Australian financial services licence](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#australian_financial_services_licence) if (and must not grant such a licence unless):
  ...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B When a licence may be granted


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B
...
  (a)   the application was [made](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s1371.html#made) in accordance with [section](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#section)   913A; and
...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B When a licence may be granted


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B
...
  (b)   [ASIC](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#asic) has no reason to believe that the applicant is likely to [contravene](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#contravene) the obligations that [will](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#will) apply under [section](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#section)   912A if the licence is grant...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B When a licence may be granted


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 913B
...
  (c)   the requirement in [section](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#section)   913BA (fit and proper [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person) test) is satisfied in relation to the applicant and the licence applied for;
and

 
  (d)   the applicant meets any other requirements prescribed by regulations [made](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s1371.html#made) for the purposes of this paragraph.

# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A

Meaning of financial product 
  (1)   A [financial product](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_product) is a facility through which, or through the acquisition of which, a [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person) does one or more of the following:

 
  (a)   [makes a financial investment](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#makes_a_financial_investment);
...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A
...
  (b)   [manages financial risk](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#manages_financial_risk);

 
  (c)   [makes non](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#makes_non) - cash [payments](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#payment).

 
This has effect subject to [section](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#section)   763E.
...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A
...
  (2)   A particular facility that is of a [kind](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#kind) through which people commonly make [financial investments](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_investment), manage [financial risks](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_risk) or make non - cash [payments](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#payment) is a [financial product](...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A
...
  (3)   A facility does not cease to be a [financial product](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_product) merely because:
...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A
...
  (a)   the facility has been [acquired](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#acquire) by a [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person) other than the [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person) to whom it was originally [issued](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#issue); and
...

...
# CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A Meaning of financial product


### CORPORATIONS ACT 2001 - SECT 763A
...
  (b)   that [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person), in acquiring the product, was not making a [financial investment](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_investment) or managing a [financial risk](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_risk).

Meaning of financial service 
General

 
  (1)   Subject to [paragraph](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s763e.html#paragraph)   (2)(b), a [person](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#person) [provides](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#provide) a [financial service](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_service) if they:
...

  (a)   [provide](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#provide) [financial product advice](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_product_advice); or

 
  (b)   deal in a [financial product](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_product); or

  (c)   make a [market](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#market) for a [financial product](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_product); or

 
  (d)   operate a [registered scheme](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#registered_scheme); or

  (da)   operate the business and [conduct](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s1439.html#conduct) the [affairs](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#affairs) of a [CCIV](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#cciv); or

  (e)   [provide](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#provide) a [custodial or depository service](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#custodial_or_depository_service); or

General obligations 
General obligations

 
  (1)   A [financial services licensee](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_services_licensee) must:

 
  (a)   do all things necessary to ensure that the [financial services](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#financial_service) covered by the licence are [provided](https://www.austlii.edu.au/cgi-bin/viewdoc/au/legis/cth/consol_act/ca2001172/s9.html#provide) efficiently, honestly and fairly; and
